Seven girls have seven bags each
49 bags
Each bag has seven big cats
343 big cats
For each big cat there are seven small cats
2401 small cats
How many legs?
Assuming each girl has two legs, each cat has four
7(2) + 343(4) + 2401(4)
10990
So there are 10990 legs on the bus

Have you heard about Rincon Valley Charter School?
Limited enrollment still available for the 2020-2021 school year!

RVUSD offers a small charter middle school at both Sequoia and Matanzas campuses for 7th and 8th graders. RVCS has a rigorous academic program with exciting and engaging learning opportunities; our schools use project-based learning and technology to enhance student engagement.
Apply now at rvusd.schoolmint.net!
Contact our school offices for questions or to set up a shadow day.
RVCS Matanzas: (707) 308-3600
RVCS Sequoia: (707) 537-8640

Want to know more about Transitional Kindergarten?

Transitional Kindergarten (KinderBridge) Information Night - January 9th 6pm at the District Office - 1000 Yulupa Ave.

Children turning 5 September 2 - December 2 are eligible for KinderBridge.

(Late Start KinderBridge: Based on enrollment numbers the district will work on a case-by-case basis to extend the ending date for TK enrollment to students who will be turning five between December 3 and February 29, provided there is space in our district's TK classes.)

Dear RVUSD families,

We just found out that the scope of the PG&E power shutdown event has been greatly reduced which means we can now open three schools that were previously announced for closure.

The following sites WILL be open for students tomorrow and Thursday:

Madrone
Binkley
Whited
Village
Spring Creek
Matanzas
RVCS- Matanzas

The following sites are still on the closure list.

Austin Creek
Sequoia
RVCS-Sequoia

If anything happens to change for these last 3 school sites, we will update you as soon as possible.

Once again, we extend our appreciation for your patience and flexibility.
